p: The corpus was coded by two of the authors, using tables with columns for each codes. The codes were developed in an inductive manner. First a set of codes were derived from the articles’ objectives stated above. After an initial review of a subset of the corpus the redundant codes were removed, while others were added to provide more detail. The final set of codes included “field of scholarship”; “methods for co-production”; “motivation for co-production”; “SDGs addressed”; “adaptation theme”; “synergies and tradeoffs between SDGs”; “localizing efforts of SDGs”; and “power asymmetries addressed”.
